text: Leonard Dawea is an Anglican bishop.World Anglican He was from his consecration on 11 September 2016 the fifth Bishop of Temotu, one of the nine dioceses that make up the Anglican Church of Melanesia: In 2019 he was elected Archbishop of Melanesia;Anglican Ink he was installed on 15 September 2019. ==References== Category:Anglican bishops in Oceania Category:20th-century Anglican bishops Category:Bishops of Temotu Category:Archbishops of Melanesia Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people
title: Leonard Dawea
